original_title: Manchester United Goals of The Season 87-88
overview: Here it is, the action-packed video that's a must for all football fans.  Now you can sit back and enjoy all the goals which won Manchester United the runners-up spot in Division One and earned them their highest points total in their history.
tagline: Manchester United Goals of The Season 87-88 is a football video released by The Video Collection on 3rd October 1988.
title: Manchester United Goals of The Season 87-88
